name: Grafana
description: Integrate with Grafana to list, get, list and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Dashboards
tools.description: List Grafana dashboards. Optionally filter by folder ID or tag. Returns dashboard titles, UIDs, and URLs.

tools.name: Get Dashboard
tools.description: Retrieve a specific Grafana dashboard by UID. Returns dashboard title, panels, and metadata.

tools.name: List Alerts
tools.description: List Grafana alert rules. Returns alert names, states, and associated dashboards.

tools.name: List Datasources
tools.description: List all Grafana datasources. Returns datasource names, types, and connection details.

tools.name: Search
tools.description: Search Grafana for dashboards and folders by query string. Returns matching items with types and UIDs.
